channel.title: Arguing with a creationist?
channel.description:
Here's what you need:
http://www.talkorigins.org/indexcc/list.html
it's essentially a handbook for proving creationists wrong.

item.title: Arguing with a creationist?
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

Imagine this as the surface of something which is black
^^^^^^^//\\$^^!^@^#^^^

It gets the light that hits it and it doesn’t let it out…

Here is white:
________________________________________________________-
The light hits it and bounces straight back off.

item.title: Arguing with a creationist?
item.dc:creator: @repacsenur repacsenur
item.description:
@repacsenur wrote:

[quote=“Cain_”][quote author=repacsenur link=topic=441500.msg3243782#msg3243782 date=1277162695]
too bad your fake non-god believing bible doesn’t know the answer why the color black attracts more heat from the sun then any other color. Yet the color black can be created from mixing any particles/dust/dirt/tar etc it’s just a color that you see with your eyes being black lol!

What makes a color so special? yet black is special in it’s effect something designed by god… I’ve looked at many many answers to do this everyone makes up some bullshit like

black color has a special geometric shape rofl these ppl are full of shit.

Although that could be linked to the color black creates a lense of some kind that can explain it but it’s still bullshit lenses require good angles of clear material so then light can be bent and color black is the total opposite.
[/quote]
Somebody should ban this troll[/quote]
Someone should tell you to keep your trap shut.

I was comparing it to a law made by God so you cannot really win this argument no matter how much science you use.

Yah C|P posted another good one about magnets.

Read full topic

item.title: Arguing with a creationist?
item.dc:creator: @Jython super_
item.description:
@Jython wrote:

[quote=“c|p, post:10, topic:345123”][quote author=la­wl link=topic=441500.msg3243811#msg3243811 date=1277164208]

too bad your fake non-god believing bible doesn’t know the answer why the color black attracts more heat from the sun then any other color. Yet the color black can be created from mixing any particles/dust/dirt/tar etc it’s just a color that you see with your eyes being black lol!

What makes a color so special? yet black is special in it’s effect something designed by god… I’ve looked at many many answers to do this everyone makes up some bullshit like

black color has a special geometric shape rofl these ppl are full of shit.

Although that could be linked to the color black creates a lense of some kind that can explain it but it’s still bullshit lenses require good angles of clear material so then light can be bent and color black is the total opposite.

the hell are you talking about? black objects absorb all light, thats why they’re black. white objects reflect all light, thats why they’re white.
[/quote]

ok if your so smart then tell me about fucking magnets, how do they work??[/quote]

i think they have little pieces of gravity in them??

item.title: Arguing with a creationist?
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“repacsenur, post:6, topic:345123”]too bad your fake non-god believing bible doesn’t know the answer why the color black attracts more heat from the sun then any other color. Yet the color black can be created from mixing any particles/dust/dirt/tar etc it’s just a color that you see with your eyes being black lol!

What makes a color so special? yet black is special in it’s effect something designed by god… I’ve looked at many many answers to do this everyone makes up some bullshit like

black color has a special geometric shape rofl these ppl are full of shit.

Although that could be linked to the color black creates a lense of some kind that can explain it but it’s still bullshit lenses require good angles of clear material so then light can be bent and color black is the total opposite.[/quote]i hate you, you are so, so fucking dumb

  1. black doesn’t attract more heat than any other colour as radiant light just strikes the surface, it doesn’t pick and choose.

  2. colour isn’t special, it’s subjective perception, it’s how your brain interprets wavelengths of light

you haven’t looked at anything, you’re just a dumb little boy that hasn’t even entered high school

Read full topic
